Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: Deborah "Debbie"
Reviews.Content: I really like this camera! You need to become familiar with the different settings to get good pictures. I lost most of the first batch I took. The next day I started looking at the settings and everything was fine. I would recommend it to anyone who wants to take decent pictures but maybe is not a serious photographer.

Reviews.Title: Pleased with this camera and its software
Reviews.Author: I. Clark
Reviews.Content: I have never used another compact digital camera, but I would consider this one very user-friendly.  It was bought as a gift for a 9-year-old who quickly taught himself how to use all its functions (and has been taking pictures constantly).  The panoramic photo tool is easy to use and very effective.  Battery life has not been a problem, but an accessory must be bought if you don't want to be limited to recharging only through a powered USB port.  Without a memory card the camera only holds about 10 photos at 7 megapixel resolution, 15 at 5 megapixel, or 4 seconds of video.  A card really is an essential purchase.  I have been very pleased with the EasyShare software.  I expected to use iPhoto on my Mac for downloads, but the Kodak software is intuitive and attractive and well organized.  Consumer Reports had this camera listed as a Best Buy and I do feel it was a good purchase.  Picture quality is quite good, the camera has a lot of useful features, and it's priced well below some comparable models by other manufacturers.

Reviews.Title: Only one complaint so far...
Reviews.Author: Don Macmurray "Semper Fi"
Reviews.Content: This camera is good for the money.  One issue I have is the speed at which it stores the image once the shutter button has been pushed.  I have an older Olympus camera that is quicker.  At first I thought it was the SIM card that I bought but it even stores slowly to the internal memory.  The work-around is that you can push the shutter button a second time to be ready for another picture while the original image is being stored.  All-in-all this camera works for my purposes.  Business.

Reviews.Title: Fabulous!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "social worker"
Reviews.Content: love it!  easy, fast, great blurr-prevention, wonderful color and great qualityplus it's compact, never a burden to take along

Reviews.Title: very good camera
Reviews.Author: Janet S. Bosse
Reviews.Content: I knew nothing about digital cameras when I bought this and it was really easy to learn how to use. The image is clear and the color good. there are many uses for this camera and I would recommend this to anyone. Actually I liked mine so well that I recently purchased one for boyfriend for his birthday.

Reviews.Title: very blurry
Reviews.Author: angelinoh
Reviews.Content: The pictures were all blurry and grainy some more than others the only good thing about the camera was the ease to reacharge.Had to return

Reviews.Title: Kodak EasyShare M753 7MP Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Mike from Vernon
Reviews.Content: The Kodak EasyShare M753 is a nice camera.  It is reasonably small and has a lot of features.  I was unfamiliar with some of the features that came with it which the manual did not describe.  It wasn't until I went to Kodak's web site and found manuals that described the features.  I am still getting used to the camera and learning about it but so far I really like it.

Reviews.Title: M753 Kodak Camera
Reviews.Author: Proud Dad
Reviews.Content: This is the fourth Kodak digital camera product our family has purchased.  Kodak consistently provides a high level of features for the dollar, and the performance has not disappointed.The M753 takes very good pictures, is a breeze to use, and is great for carrying for taking pictures anywhere at anytime.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use & Great pictures!
Reviews.Author: Beach Bound "Snappin Pics"
Reviews.Content: This camera couldnt be easier to use!  And the pictures and video are crystal clear.  Couldnt ask for a better camera.

Reviews.Title: It's alright
Reviews.Author: R. WILLIAMS "The Lady"
Reviews.Content: This product is ok....I will say that Amazon is thorough and gives great customer service...The camera came in a timely manner.

Reviews.Title: Kodak
Reviews.Author: S. L. Sedam
Reviews.Content: This was a good upgrade from my last digital camera.  It has/will serve its purpose.

Reviews.Title: Exelent Camera for The Price!!
Reviews.Author: M. Goicoechea
Reviews.Content: Well i buy one of those, and im very impress for the quality of the pics, exelent choise just one cons, its plastic but it resistent
